subject: SUBJECT: Last Phase of UNS
body:
SUBJECT: Last Phase of UNSDG COVID-19 Business Palliative Funds  2020 for
medium and large scale Business($100,000 to $10 million capital/investment base).
Greetings!
Hope you are safe from the pandemic troubling the world and her economic activities. My name is Mallam Nurudeen Kyari. I am the first son of late Abba Kyari, the former Chief of Staff to Nigerian former President Muhammadu Buhari. My late father was the director/chairman of Covid-19 Palliatives in Nigeria. Unfortunately he contracted the deadly virus while in Germany for a business meetings with Siemens AG, a meeting meant to cushion the effect of the covid-19 in the countryâ€™s economy; See news website:
https:/ /www.reuters.com/article/us-health-coronavirus-nigeria-idUSKBN220001
He eventually died of the virus and was buried immediately according to Islamic rite. After his death, the distribution of covid-19 palliatives was halted.
However, my late father had left an unexhausted covid-19 palliative sum of $32,000,000 (thirty-two million US Dollars) in a bank (bank name not mentioned for confidential purposes). No member of our family can effectively reclaim this fund for our benefits without the government clamping down. So we have decided to seek a foreigner, have an Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) and transfer the ownership of the fund to him/her custody for foreign investment in accordance with the Terms of MOU.
Note: It is confidential. It is 100% legal, 100% official and 100% risk-free. All the fund deposit documents of the deceased which will be transferred to you upon your acceptance are with the family. Please if you are not interested do not expose the family secret.
Kindly send me; your acceptance letter.
I await your immediate and positive response.
Sincerely,
Family Attorney.
FOR:
Mallam Nurudeen Kyari (
nurudeen_kyari@outlook.com
)
Head of Kyari Empire, Bornu state-Nigeria.

subject: Re:     SUBJECT: Last Phase of UNS
body:
Hello Mallam Nurudeen Kyari,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you and your family are safe during these challenging times. I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your father, Chief of Staff Abba Kyari.

I understand that you have a significant sum of money that needs to be transferred for foreign investment. Could you please provide more details about the terms and conditions of this investment opportunity? I would like to know how it aligns with my own investment goals and what kind of returns I can expect.

Additionally, could you clarify the role of the family attorney in this process? What specific steps need to be taken to ensure a smooth transfer of funds?

Thank you, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Gloria
